ModMetaData.name: Stuffable Armor and Clothes
ModMetaData.author: crazedmonkey231
ModMetaData.description:
This is a simple xpath patch library with simple settings that allows you to choose what metal/wood/stone your clothing or armor is made of.
All patches are loaded at start up that's and why settings need to be restarted.
Compatibility: - This mod is compatible with saved games.
- This mod is not recommended to be removed from saves. - This mod is not compatible with other mods that significantly change the vanilla armor like CE.
- Multiplayer is untested but since this runs everything at start up and to remain in sync I recommend making it a manditory mod.
- Current Patches Available: - Vanilla Armours Expanded (VAE must be loaded before this mod) - Flak Armors: SpecOps Edition - Contractor's Arsenal - Risk of Rain: UES Contact Light Armory - Altered Carbon's Protectorate Armor - Glass+Lights - Expanded Materials - Plastics - Rimworld: Spartan Foundry (Continued) (Makes All Armors craftable/stuffable) - A Mod About Meat (enable in settings) - Blood and Bones (enable in settings) - Science Never Stops: Ambition of the Cosmic - Orassans - [RH2] Rimmu-Nation² - Clothing - Ancient Fallout Armory - Vanilla Apparel Expanded - Rimsenal - Core - Rimsenal - Augmented Vanilla Pack - Royal Arsenal - Rim-Effect: Core - Rim-Effect: N7 - Rim-Effect: Asari and Reapers
Shouldn't cause issues unless changes made to these armors by other mods.
Any issue please drop a note on the mod page :)
If you are looking for your clothing to have ART?! check it out under my steam page.
Happy Stuffing
